div.p: RHINFELS a caſtle of Germany, in the circle oſ the Lower Rhine, in a county of the ſame name. It is looked upon as one of the moſt important places ſeated on the Rhine, as well in regard to its ſtrength as ſituation. It is near St Goar, and built on a craggy rock. This fortrefs commands the whole breadth of the Rhine, and thoſe who paſs are always obliged to pay a conſiderable toll. In the time of war it is of great importance to be maſters of this place. E. Long. 7. 43. N. Lat. 50. 3.
